name: Welcome to Hell, Mei Ichikawa
description:
"What happen after people die? Could you.. ever see  them again?
The story is about Mei, an ordinary teenage girl. She is living a peaceful life with her mother, but. Dark covered her fate after she and her mother had a terrible Car accident which also robbed Mei's mother from her forever.

Mei however, survived by some mystic miracles, she cannot bear the cruel fact and the loneliness. Mei has chosen  to suicide to escape reality life.
However, that's when she discover there is another world where is always right there but she just never knew about it. A world for the deads. A world filled with Strange Things, Strange Characters, Invaluable Treasures...

A world where  - perhaps, Mei could have a chance to see her dear mother again, once more time..."

A product by @Isabella Ava
Many thanks to Yanfly, SrdDude, Hime, Gamefall Team, MrTrivel, MogHunter, HiddenOne, Pandamaru, Avery, Triaconate, Tsukimi, Futokoro, Freepik, Galv, Whtdragon, Kadokawa & many others

Welcome to Hell, Mei Ichikawa: is an JRPG game made in 1 month for the IGMC2018
